r.d: This is an API wrapper for the useketchup.com API. You may use it to create projects, meetings, items, notes and also user accounts to the useketchup.com service.
r.n: * bugfix: Services_UseKetchup_Common::accept() (did not exit after HTTP_Request2 was injected) * bugfix: make sure the custom HTTP_Request2 is injected into subs * refactoring: moved getApiToken() call from __construct() * improved documentation * added ublic getClient() method
